nodes.text: R2-MK was the R2-series astromech droid companion of the Jedi Master Mickey Mouse during the era that saw the fall of the Galactic Republic and the rise of the Galactic Empire. Together, R2-MK and Jedi Mickey partook in many galactic adventures. Unlike other members of its droid series, R2-MK bore some modifications to its head, specifically possessing a plate strongly resembling the ears of its master's species.

This droid was a toy made available exclusively at Disney Parks beginning in Spring 2010. It was meant to be the astromech droid owned by "Jedi Mickey", the Jedi robe-wearing Mickey Mouse released as an action figure as another Disney exclusive.
